awd_titl_txt: Research and Resource Center For Electron Microscopy
awd_abstract_narration: This Research Improvement in Minority Institutions (RIMI)                       project will establish a resource center for electron                           microscopy.  The center will serve  several local colleges and                  universities in the Atlanta area including Morehouse College,                   Spelman College, Morris Brown College, the Morehouse School of                  Medicine, and Clark-Atlanta University.  These institutions                     need adequate  professional technical staff support to enhance                  the research infrastructure and maintain the existing                           microscopy facilities.  Special activities in the center will                   include summer and academic year workshops on advanced electron                 microcopy and a research colloquium series.                                                                                                                     This project will further enhance the posture of meritorious                    research in the  Clark-Atlanta University Center and will                       strengthen the research productivity  of promising                              investigators.  Students will benefit significantly by                          increased  exposure to research.  The principal investigators                   are well trained and have  published in refereed journals.
org_div_long_name: Div. of Equity for Excellence in STEM
